page.title: 07Children's Games
page.content: {At School}we play racing, cricket, rounders, football and horses. British Bulldog and toy fights are banned because the are too rough, but we play them at home. For PE we play indoor cricket, chain tig, hockey, pirates, dodge-ball and non-stop cricket. We practice athletics. The boys play in football tournaments and the girls play in net-ball tournaments against other schools. We go swimming and are taught to swim properly. We can win badges if we can swim well enough. In the Summer we have a Sports Meeting with two other small country schools. We can also go sailing and orienteering. {At home}we also play swing-ball and tennis. We also play with our pets. If it is raining we play on the computer or play cards, houses, schools or Scrabble.
